mapper.insert: INSERT INTO train_advert( ad_name, ad_type, ad_pic, ad_url, remark, sort, del_flag, create_time, parent_ids ) VALUES ( #{adName}, #{adType}, #{adPic}, #{adUrl}, #{remark}, #{sort}, #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE}, SYSDATE(), #{parentIds} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ad_id AS adId, a.ad_name AS adName, a.ad_type AS adType, a.ad_pic AS adPic, a.ad_url AS adUrl, a.remark, a.sort, c.id AS "dict.id", c.label AS "dict.label", c.type AS "dict.type", c.description AS "dict.description", c.sort AS "dict.sort", c.parent_id AS "dict.parentId", c.create_by AS "dict.createBy", c.create_date AS "dict.createDate", c.update_by AS "dict.updateBy", c.update_date AS "dict.updateDate", c.remarks AS "dict.remarks", c.del_flag AS "dict.delFlag", f.banner_id AS "franchiseeBanner.bannerId", f.create_franise_id AS "franchiseeBanner.createFranchisee", GROUP_CONCAT(f.so_franise_id) AS "soFranchiseeIds" FROM train_advert a LEFT JOIN train_franchisee_advert f ON a.ad_id = f.banner_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict c ON a.ad_type = c.value WHERE c.type = 'banner_type' AND c.del_flag = 0 AND ad_id = #{adId}
mapper.update: UPDATE train_advert SET ad_name = #{adName}, ad_type = #{adType}, ad_pic = #{adPic}, ad_url = #{adUrl}, remark = #{remark}, sort = #{sort}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, del_flag = 1 WHERE ad_id = #{adId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM trains.train_franchisee_advert WHERE create_franise_id = #{createFranchisee} AND banner_id = #{bannerId}
